Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class maintains the game state as well as containing the logic for most of the actions possible in a game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      GameManager()

    • Method Detail

      • beginRound

        public void beginRound()
        Triggers the beginning of a round. The blinds are collected and the players are dealt their cards.

      • setBlinds

        public void setBlinds()
        Sets the flags for which players just bet the large and small blinds.

      • subtractBlinds

        public void subtractBlinds()
        Collects the blinds from the players that are responsible for them.

      • deal

        public void deal()
        Deals each players their hands.

      • addPlayerToGame

        public int addPlayerToGame(int stack,
                           int playerID)
        Adds a player to the game.
        Parameters:
        stack - The stack starting value for the new player.
        playerID - The ID of the new player
        Returns:
        int - Returns 0 on the player being added to the game and -1 if the game is at capacity

      • removePlayerFromGame

        public int removePlayerFromGame(int playerID)
        Removes a player from the game.
        Parameters:
        playerID - The ID of the player to be removed.
        Returns:
        int Returns 0 on the player being successfully removed, -1 if there are no players in the game.

      • rotatePlayers

        public void rotatePlayers()

      • checkTurn

        public boolean checkTurn(int playerID)
        Checks if it is the specified players turn
        Parameters:
        playerID - The player to check
        Returns:
        boolean - True if it is the player's turn, false otherwise

      • bet

        public void bet(int playerID,
                int amount)
        Processes a player's bet.
        Parameters:
        playerID - The ID of the player that is betting
        amount - The amount to be bet

      • isGameOn

        public boolean isGameOn()
        Check if the game is currently on.
        Returns:
        boolean - True if the game is on, False if the game is not on.

        public void setGameOn(boolean b)
